com.samsung.android.sdk.health.content

Class ShealthProfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.health.content.ShealthProfile

  • public class ShealthProfile
extends Object
    This class provides the functionality to manage the user profile. Only specific applications can modify the profile information based on their access rights. All properties of this class are mandatory. Your application must set all the properties with valid values and call the save() method. You can call load() to get the current profile information and set the properties to be updated

    • Constructor Detail

      • ShealthProfile

        public ShealthProfile(Context context)
               throws IllegalArgumentException,
                      NullPointerException,
                      IllegalStateException
        Creates and loads an ShealthProfile instance.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context for your application.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the device does not support ShealthProfile.
        NullPointerException - Thrown if the Context passed is null. This can happen if you did not initialize the Health package before creating the ShealthProfile instance.
        IllegalStateException
